member.name: IDXGIDebug1.DisableLeakTrackingForThread
member.summary: Stops tracking leaks for the current thread.

member.name: IDXGIDebug1.EnableLeakTrackingForThread
member.summary: Starts tracking leaks for the current thread.

member.name: IDXGIDebug1.IsLeakTrackingEnabledForThread
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether leak tracking is turned on for the current thread.
member.returns: TRUE if leak tracking is turned on for the current thread; otherwise, FALSE.

member.name: IDXGIDebug1
member.summary: Controls debug settings for Microsoft DirectX Graphics Infrastructure (DXGI). You can use the IDXGIDebug1 interface in Windows Store apps.
